text: The "Kazenbo" is a demon from Toriyama Sekien's picture book "Konjaku Hyakki Shui" (A Guide to a Hundred Demons, Past and Present).

It was believed to appear in Mt. Toribe in Kyoto, which was known as an old burial ground in the Heian period. It is portrayed as a beggar bonze (Buddhist teacher) who is engulfed by flames and smoke.
